div.div: St. Norbert College vs. Monmouth College

tr.td: Monmouth wins toss, defers, will kickoff and defend North Goal.
Start of 1st quarter, clock 15:00, MC ball on MC35.
Matt Batton kickoff 55 yards to the SNC10, Brian Fliess return 12 yards to the SNC22 (Dan Burk), PENALTY SNC IB 10 yards to the SNC12, 1st and 10, SNC ball on SNC12.
Austin Williams rush for 2 yards to the SNC9 (Patrick Dabbs).
Austin Williams rush for loss of 4 yards to the SNC5 (Sam Hoster;M. Lafferty).
James Tringali pass incomplete to Brian Fliess (M. Lafferty).
Kevin Krueger punt 37 yards to the SNC42, Michael Buehne return 1 yards to the SNC41.
Brik Wedekind pass incomplete to C.J. Shields.
Trey Yocum rush for 2 yards to the SNC39 (Brian Feltz).
Brik Wedekind sacked for loss of 10 yards to the SNC49 (Adam Nitsche).
Brik Wedekind punt 29 yards to the SNC20, fair catch by Brian Fliess.
